message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for sale. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its actual cost to us. Considering its value, I propose we set the price at $140. This offers you a great deal while ensuring we receive a fair return for our efforts in sourcing and presenting this item to you. I look forward to your response.

Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're placing on your product. However, my budget for this item is $120.  I'd be happy to purchase it for that price. Let me know if that works for you.
